description:
The Straw Hats confront Pudding - the fiancée of Sanji! But when they challenge her for Sanji`s heart, her answer shocks them! Meanwhile an ominous and mysterious message may spell doom for the Straw Hats...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Tochter der Kaiserin! – Sanjis Verlobte, Pudding!
La fille de la Yonkou ! La fiancée de Sanji, Pudding
The Emperor`s Daughter! Sanji`s Fiancee: Pudding!
Yonkou no Musume: Sanji no Fiancee Purin
四皇の娘 サンジの婚約者[フィアンセ]プリン
